text: Khabaradara! Upasana khasa allahakai lagi ho. Ra jasale usa baheka aru mitra bana'eka chan ra bhandachan kih ‘‘hamile yiniharula'i yasakarana pujdachaum ki hamila'i allahako samipyata prapta gara'idi'un.’’ Niscaya nai allahale uniharuko bicama tyasa kurako phaisala garidinecha jasama uniharule vivada garirakheka chan. Allahale usala'i marga dekha'umdaina jo jhutho ra akrtajna cha
